class.name: TfVisualCalc
class.description:
A panel widget that eases interactive manipulation (and conversion) of transformations.
Transformations are visualized through rviz TF and optional Markers. Input and output for each transformation in tree can be a: - Homogenous matrix - Vector + RPY-Rotation - Vector + Quaternion - DH Parameters (output only if possible) Parent to child relations in tree can be directly manipulated.
The panel can be initialized by the current TF tree.
